data.title: Preity Zinta, Husband Gene Goodenough Add Stardust To Sohail Khan's Eid Party
data.meta_description: Preity Zinta looked stunning in an all-black ensemble. Fans compared her look for the night with her character in Yash Chopra's Veer-Zaara
data.text:
affair welcomed notable figures from Bollywood, including Sohail’s brothers Salman and Arbaaz, alongside Animal star Bobby Deol. However, it was Preity Zinta who illuminated the event with her presence. The evergreen actress is just aging like a fine wine, capturing hearts with her timeless grace.

For the party, Preity wore a black kurta-palazzo set intricately embellished with white embroidery and complemented by a coordinating dupatta. She completed her attire with heavy statement jewellery and left her hair open. The actress greeted the paparazzi with a warm smile.

The actress attended the party alongside her husband, Gene Goodenough, who exuded charm in an all-black ensemble. The gorgeous couple captured attention as they posed affectionately for the shutterbugs.

Fans and followers of the actress inundated the comment section with love and admiration. One user wrote, “The real chand ki chandni,” while another commented, “Timeless beauty.”

Apart from Preity Zinta, Arpita Khan and Aayush Sharma were also captured outside Sohail’s residence. Arpita opted for a striking black saree adorned with vibrant red floral prints, complemented by a statement necklace. On the other hand, her husband and actor Aayush wore an all-white traditional ensemble, featuring a kurta pajama set paired with a Nehru jacket.

Other stars who attended the bash included Suniel Shetty, Iulia Vantur, Genelia Deshmukh, Arbaaz Khan’s wife Sshura Khan, among others.

On the professional front, Preity made her Bollywood debut with Mani Ratnam’s Dil Se in 1998. She was last seen on the big screen in 2013 with the film Ishkq in Paris. Throughout her illustrious career, the actor has left an indelible mark with iconic performances in films such as Kal Ho Naa Ho, Veer Zaara, Dil Chahta Hai, Koi…Mil Gaya, Lakshya and many more.
